>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<



>>===== RESULT =====>>
Journal A: Long version
<<===== RESULT =====<<

>>===== OPTIONS =====>>
{
    "main_title_from_short_title": true, 
    "uppercase_subtitles": true
}
<<===== OPTIONS =====<<

>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <text variable="container-title"/>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "container-title": "Journal A: long version", 
        "container-title-short": "Journal A", 
        "type": "article-journal"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
